title: Ticket #2697: DOC EC2 support for EBS Volumes, and VPC
remarks:
2012-Apr-25 15:18:48 by tstclair:
added example with all the updated submission params and comments above so users can crib directly.

Uncertain if we want to break out prose for everything. I'll let the doc folks care about that.

2012-May-25 11:36:53 by smoler:
Developers place the 'code' ticket into the 'doc pending' state, and then get the documentation completed before resolution. Therefore, this ticket is an unneeded and bogus extra ticket only for documentation. See the original ticket for the documentation commits/completion: #2252.
check_ins: 2012-Apr-25 15:14   Check-in [31823]: Added ec2 doc example which outlines all the new shiny features. This will require some doc oversight as there are links and refs which I'm not certain where to place. ===GT=== #2697 (By Timothy St. Clair )
creator: tstclair
